result.markdown:
--- title: "Cases and climate variables multivariate clustering" author: Raphael Saldanha date: last-modified --- This notebook aims to cluster the Brazilian municipalities considering climate indicators with multivariate clustering techniques. ## Packages ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) library(arrow) library(timetk) library(dtwclust) library(kableExtra) library(tictoc) library(sf) library(DT) source("../functions.R") ``` ::: ## Load data Daily, scaled cases, maximum temperature, minimum temperature and precipitation. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tdengue <- open_dataset(sources = data_dir("bundled_data/tdengue.parquet")) %>% select(mun, date, cases, tmax, tmin, prec) %>% collect() dim(tdengue) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 157932 6 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} length(unique(tdengue$mun)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 158 ``` ::: ::: Data for maps. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} uf_sf <- geobr::read_state(showProgress = FALSE) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Using year 2010 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} coords <- geobr::read_municipality(showProgress = FALSE) %>% st_make_valid() %>% st_centroid() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Using year 2010 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: st_centroid assumes attributes are constant over geometries ``` ::: ::: ## Prepare data For clustering, the data must be a list of data frames with climate data and without date. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gdengue <- tdengue %>% group_by(mun) %>% arrange(date) %>% select(-date) mdengue <- group_split(gdengue, .keep = FALSE) %>% tslist(simplify = TRUE) names(mdengue) <- group_keys(gdengue)$mun ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} glimpse(mdengue[1:3]) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` List of 3 $ 110020: num [1:1001, 1:4] -0.5201 0.1558 0.1558 0.0713 0.0713 ... ..- attr(*, "dimnames")=List of 2 .. ..$ : NULL .. ..$ : chr [1:4] "cases" "tmax" "tmin" "prec" $ 120040: num [1:1002, 1:4] 1.33 1.33 11.52 11.52 9.04 ... ..- attr(*, "dimnames")=List of 2 .. ..$ : NULL .. ..$ : chr [1:4] "cases" "tmax" "tmin" "prec" $ 130260: num [1:1002, 1:4] 0.0251 0.0251 2.2631 2.2631 2.2171 ... ..- attr(*, "dimnames")=List of 2 .. ..$ : NULL .. ..$ : chr [1:4] "cases" "tmax" "tmin" "prec" ``` ::: ::: ## DTW clustering Try from 3 to 20 partitions. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tic() stdw_clust <- tsclust( series = mdengue, type = "partitional", k = 3:20, distance = "dtw_basic", seed = 13 ) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 7.945 sec elapsed ``` ::: ::: ### Cluster Validity Indices (CVI) ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} names(stdw_clust) <- paste0("k_", 3:20) res_cvi <- sapply(stdw_clust, cvi, type = "internal") %>% t() %>% as_tibble(rownames = "k") %>% arrange(-Sil) datatable(res_cvi) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} m_sel_clust <- stdw_clust[[res_cvi[[1,1]]]] plot(m_sel_clust) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](cluster_multivariate_all_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Partitions size ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} table(m_sel_clust@cluster) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 1 2 3 8 47 103 ``` ::: ::: ### Partition results ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} coords <- coords %>% mutate(code_muni = substr(code_muni, 0, 6)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} m_cluster_ids <- tibble( code_muni = names(mdengue), group = as.character(m_sel_clust@cluster) ) %>% left_join(coords, by = "code_muni") %>% arrange(group, name_muni) %>% st_as_sf() ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} saveRDS(object = m_cluster_ids, file = "m_cluster_ids.rds") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} m_cluster_ids %>% select(group, name_muni, abbrev_state) %>% arrange(group, name_muni) %>% st_drop_geometry() %>% datatable() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot() + geom_sf(data = uf_sf, fill = "lightgray", color = "grey20", size=.15, show.legend = FALSE) + geom_sf(data = m_cluster_ids, aes(color = group), size = 2, alpha = 0.7) + theme_minimal() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](cluster_multivariate_all_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ## Session info ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sessionInfo() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` R version 4.3.2 (2023-10-31) Platform: x86_64-conda-linux-gnu (64-bit) Running under: CentOS Linux 7 (Core) Matrix products:
